articles.description: TOKYO (AP) — A 243-kilogram (535-pound) bluefin tuna sold for a record 510 million yen ($3.2 million) at the first auction of 2026 at Tokyo’s Toyosu fish market. articles.title: Copper Surges Toward Record on Tariff Concerns and Risk-On Mood
articles.description: Copper surged toward a record on concerns about tightening supplies in the new year, as well as a risk-on mood in wider markets.
